sourcesContent:
// 投资页面 import { useState , useEffect } from "react" import { Collapse , Button , Layout } from 'antd'; import axios from "axios" import "./investment.css" import getWeb3 from "./../../web3/web3" import vaultApi from "../../contractAPI/vaultApi" import { getInvestmentList, getInvestmentDetail } from "./../../api/investment" const { Header } = Layout; const { Panel } = Collapse; function callback(key) { console.log(key); } const text = (
reward pool地址：
策略地址：
代币地址
金库地址
金库owner
策略opwner
) const Investment = () => { const [dataArray , setDataArray] = useState([]) const [ investmentList, setInvestmentList] = useState([]) const [ nvestmentDetail , setNvestmentDetail ] = useState() useEffect( ()=>{ axios.get("https://api.converter.finance/getTokenList").then(res=>{ console.log(res.data.data) const data = res.data.data setDataArray(data) const newData = data.map(item=>{ const fn = (async function(){ const obj = await getWeb3() const web3 = obj.web3 const owner = new web3.eth.Contract(vaultApi, item.vault_address ) // console.log(owner) let vaultOwner = await owner.methods.owner().call(); console.log(vaultOwner) })() return (
reward pool地址： {item.pool_address}
策略地址： {item.strategy_address}
代币地址 {item.underlying_address}
金库地址 {item.vault_address}
金库owner
策略opwner
)}) setInvestmentList(newData) }) } ,[] ) return(
POOL INFO
一键EARN 一键HARVEST
名称 收益代币
{ investmentList.map((item,index)=>{ return(
{dataArray[index]["underlying_name"]} {dataArray[index]["strategy_index"]}
} key="1">

{investmentList[index]}

) }) } ) } export default Investment
